Unnamed: 5: Since $f\left(x\right)=\frac{2x-3}{3x+1}=\frac{2}{3} - \frac{11}{3} \cdot\frac{1}{3x+1}$ and the range of $\frac{1}{3x+1}$ is $\left\{y\in \mathbb{R}\mid y\ne 0\right\}$, we have $R_{f} =\left\{y\in \mathbb{R}\mid y\ne \frac{2}{3} \right\}$ .
